thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Novozymes Q1 EBIT Above Expectations At DKK 1.02 Billion

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Novozymes Q1 EBIT Above Expectations At DKK 1.02 Billion
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - NOVOZYMES A/S:
* REG-INTERIM REPORT FOR THE FIRST THREE MONTHS OF 2018
* FULL-YEAR 2018 OUTLOOK MAINTAINED
* Q1 EBIT DKK 1.02 BILLION (REUTERS POLL DKK 990 MILLION) * “THERE IS STILL SOME UNCERTAINTY IN THE AGRICULTURE-RELATED BUSINESS, INCLUDING FROM RECENT GEOPOLITICAL TENSIONS”
* Q1 SALES DKK 3.52 BILLION (REUTERS POLL DKK 3.61 BILLION)
* “THERE IS STILL SOME UNCERTAINTY IN THE AGRICULTURE-RELATED BUSINESS, INCLUDING FROM RECENT GEOPOLITICAL TENSIONS”
* Q1 ORGANIC SALES GROWTH OF 2% AND -6% IN DKK. USD/DKK DECLINE OF 13% IN Q1 Y/Y
* Q1 NET PROFIT DKK 807 MILLION (REUTERS POLL DKK 778 MILLION)
* “WE REMAIN FIRM ABOUT ACCELERATING SALES GROWTH THROUGHOUT 2018 AND BEYOND.” - CEO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
